title: LoL Lores
body: I have recently been getting interested into champion lores recently and I think it'll be AMAZING if they made like cinematic-ish things about them. I was thinking like a narrator reading the lore as a cinematic of what is happening is playing. Please be minded this is just an idea. I have not checked to see if anyone has thought of it before but I think it'll be pretty cool. Also riot some of the lores are just plain bad .-. like bard and tristana basically have no lore.
